TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit DispatchSource/Data extends MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.DispatchSource

Docs.summary: Base class for dispatch sources that allow applications to trigger an event handler on the target queue.

remarks.para: Applications can post data onto a by calling the method. The data is surfaced is then available in to the handler in the property.
If multiple calls to MergeData are done, the result surfaced by PendingData will depend on whether you created a which will add the values together or a which will or the values together.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MergeData(native int value) cil managed

Docs.param: Data to be posted to the event source.
Docs.summary: Posts the specific value and triggers the event handler on the target queue.

remarks.para: Applications can post data onto a by calling the method. The data is surfaced is then available in to the handler in the property.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the data that has been posted for this event source.
Docs.value: The result of the data posted to the data dispatch source.

remarks.para: If multiple calls to MergeData are done, the result surfaced by PendingData will depend on whether you created a which will add the values together or a which will or the values together.
